props.name: closeText
props.description: Override the default label for the close popup icon button

props.name: color
props.description: The main color for the alert

props.name: icon
props.description: Override the icon displayed before the children

props.name: iconMapping
props.description: The component maps the severity prop to a range of different icons

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed
